DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective analysis of surgery and/or bronchial embolisation for pulmonary aspergilloma.
DOC.brief_title: Outcome After Treatment of Pulmonary Aspergilloma
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective chart analysis, based on the search results from a thoracic surgery database and an interventional radiology database. Outcome analysis of all surgically treated patients for a confirmed invasive aspergilloma. Comparisson with (preoperative) embolisation of the bronchial circulation.
DOC.criteria: Histological proven Aspergilloma of the lung Treatment limited to the use of systemic antifungal agents
